title: Image 6: Discover how Large Language Models (LLMs) handle language tasks and the methods to reduce AI inaccuracies known as hallucinations. This study evaluates different prompt engineering strategies, revealing that simpler techniques often outperform complex ones. It also explores how tool-calling agents, which augment LLMs with external tools, can increase hallucination rates, emphasizing the importance of balanced prompt design for optimal performance in NLP tasks.
